Classes in org.sonatype.restsimple.api used by org.sonatype.restsimple
Action
          An abstract representation of a Service.
ActionContext
          This class encapsulates the REST request, e.g the headers, the form parameters, the path and it's value.
ActionException
          A runtime exception thrown from an Action.
ServiceDefinition
          A ServiceDefinition represents a REST resource.
